title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Abby: PART 1
itunes:title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Abby: PART 1
description:
The Best Bits podcast is now officially separated into two podcasts!! This part of the podcast is the version you all have been wanting as a stand-alone, Morgan and a guest having their in-depth conversations without any interruptions. In this podcast you’ll hear Morgan and Abby talk about some personal things going on in their life. They break down the Charity Softball Game Drama, and they discussed their favorite snacks and recent music collaborations.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
